quotes: for the French-owned utility company EDF Energy since 2004.
The Deal, a 2003 television film, followed Tony Blair's rise to power, and his friendship and rivalry with Brown, played by David Morrissey.
In The Trial of Tony Blair (2007), Brown was played by Peter Mullan,
and in the Channel 4 television film Coalition (2015), he was portrayed by Ian Grieve.
Brown delivers the Harold Wilson memorial lecture at the University of Huddersfield in 2018

Honorary Doctor of Humane Letters (DHL) from New York University (2005)
Honorary Doctor of Civil Law (DCL) from Newcastle University (2007)
Honorary Doctor of Letters (DLitt) from University of Delhi (2008)
